name: [SGP - 0011] Tangle Community Grant Committee - Lead selection

questions.text: Should Candidate "Linus Nauman" become the Program Lead of the Tangle Community Treasury?

answers.additionalInfo: Read the application letter of the candidate here: [https://govern.iota.org/t/linus-naumann-program-lead-application-round-2/1734/1](https://govern.iota.org/t/linus-naumann-program-lead-application-round-2/1734/1)
